org.araneaframework.uilib.form.converter
Interface ConverterProvider

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConverterFactory
public interface ConverterProvider
extends Serializable

Provides access to registered Converters.

Since 1.1 this interface extends Serializable.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Converter, ConverterFactory, GenericFormElement.convert()

Method Summary
 Converter findConverter(DataType fromType, DataType toType)
          This method should return a BaseConvertercorresponding to the two types given.
 

Method Detail

findConverter

Converter findConverter(DataType fromType,
                        DataType toType)
                        throws ConverterNotFoundException
This method should return a BaseConvertercorresponding to the two types given.

Parameters:
fromType - from type.
toType - to type.
Returns:
BaseConverter corresponding to the types given.
Throws:
ConverterNotFoundException - if BaseConverteris not found
